Title: TC002 - Independent Travel Training
Description:
The Borough Council of Bolton ("the Authority") is prepared to receive tenders for Independent Travel Training which will be subject to the information, specification and tender package enclosed.
The aim is to ensure that referred children and young people are able to travel safely and independently, and to equip them with valuable life-skills which allows them increased access to social and recreational activities in preparation for their transition to adulthood and increasing their access to learning, training and work opportunities.

Title: Stockport Councils Supported Employment Contract
Supplier [Name|Address|Ref type|Ref Numb: [Pure Innovation Limited|5 Rhino Court, Branhall Moor Lane, Hazel Grove, SK7 5ER|NONE||Yes|No]

Title: Stockport Council's Mentoring And Care Leavers Forum Service
Description: This is an open invitation to tender for a provider to provide Stockport Council with a Mentoring and Care Leavers Forum Service for young people 16+. The contract is for an initial 24 month period with the option to extend for a further 12 months. Further information can be found in the ITT step on "The Chest" portal.
